title: Missing Level Up Capsule
body: I leveled up to level 34 yesterday and never received a level up capsule, my friend leveled up to level 34 a while later and did receive the capsule. I thought it may just be I needed to wait a while and it would be there next time I logged in, but I logged in today and it's still not there.

replies.body: Looks like some people have been missing their level up rewards for some reason, haven't been able to narrow down what caused it yet unfortunately. I can still line up the times where you got your level up though and was able to get that added for ya.
Could i get that check for mine as well? i have a missing capsule.
Thank you so much, I did indeed get it. In the game I leveled up I had got a mastery token so maybe that has something to do with it.
Same problem for me from level 31 to 32. I submitted 2 tickets to Riot and they deleted each one without giving any response or fixing the problem...

I leveled up to 41 and i received my capsule but before opening it i forged a key and unlocked a chest. After that the capsule was gone. I also declined a game wile i was forging the key and unlocking the chest ... "narrowing it down for you" :p
I had the same problem from level 36 to level 37
Had the same problem from 37 to 38
I also had this issue. Submitted a ticket yesterday, when it occurred.
